name: wryter
description: Get a random writing prompt every day.

scripts.install: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:frontend: trap 'kill %1; echo killed' ERR EXIT; npm run start:backend:test & npm run test --prefix frontend
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap --prefix frontend && npm run build

author: David Eugene Pratt & Cassidy Tillemans
